      • newQuack

        @RequestMapping(value="/quack",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String newQuack(@RequestParam
                                                                                              java.lang.String message,
                                                                                              @RequestParam(value="file",required=false)
                                                                                              org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file,
                                                                                              User poster)
                                                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Post mapping for /quack. New quacks are posted with this endpoint.
        Parameters:
        message - Quack message to be posted
        file - (optional) File attached to quack
        Returns:
        Redirect to /
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        @RequestMapping(value="/like/{id}",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String newQuack(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                 long id,
                                                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                 User liker)
        This endpoint provides the like functionality for a quack.
        Parameters:
        id - Id value of the quack that will be liked
        Returns:
        Redirect to the users page who had posted the quack to be liked
